Conversion of an analog signal to a digital signal& with steps between specified levels.     利用规定量化间隔&把模拟信号转化成数字信号。参阅quantization。 Pertaining to a device that operates in a proportional or continuous manner& such as an analog amplifier. Not discrete or digital& but analog.     用于修饰或说明一种设备（工作特性）的术语&这种设备以成比例或连续方式进行工作&例如用于说明模拟放大器的工作特性不是离散的或数字的&而是模拟的。

Antibodies destroy or weaken bacteria and neutralize organic poisons& thus forming the basis of immunity.     抗体&免疫体血液或组织针对某种抗原如细菌或毒素而产生的蛋白质物质。抗体消灭细菌或削弱其作用&中和有机毒素&因而形成免疫力 Relating to the correspondence between an antigen and the antibody produced in response to it.     同源的与抗原和对其反应产生的抗体同的对应现象有关的

It will not befit a priest to act uncharitably.     牧师不以慈悲为怀是不合适的。 You should dress in a way that befits a woman of your position.     你的衣着应与你这种地位的妇女相称。

When did you begin learning English?     你何时开始学习英语的？ The new fare will be 1& beginning (from) next month.     从下月起& 新车费为1英镑.

I missed the beginning of the film.     电影的开头部分我没有看到。 You have made a good beginning.     你已经做出了良好的开端。
On behalf of my colleagues and myself I thank you.     我代表我的同事和我本人向你表示感谢。 I put up the proposal on your behalf.     我是为你的利益才提出这个建议的。

column2: v. 举止&行为&举止端正

Their behavior towards me shows that they do not like me.     他们对我的举止说明他们不喜欢我。 His behavior was& in a word& shocking.     总之&他的行为是令人震惊的。

column2: ad. 在后地 prep. 在...之后
column3: Don't look behind or you may fall.     别向后看&不然你会摔跤的。 Your watch runs behind.     你的表慢了。

She seems very plain but he dotes on her& but beauty is in the eye of the beholder.     她看上去相貌平平&但他非常爱她&情人眼中出西施。 I don't understand how he can think she is good looking& but beauty is in the eye of the beholder.     我不明白他怎么会认为她漂亮&不过情人眼里出西施罢了。

column2: n. 人&生物 art. 在&有&是
column3: What is the purpose of our being?     我们生存的目的是什么？ When did the world come into being?     世界是什么时候形成的？

Bel liked expensive things.     贝尔喜欢昂贵的东西。 The guard opened a different door& and Bel and the cat went into a beautiful room with expensive& very old tables and chairs.     卫兵打开另外一扇门&贝尔和那只猫走进一个摆满非常古老、昂贵的家具的房间。
Belgium has been called the cockpit of Europe.     比利时被称作欧洲战场。 France knocked Belgium out (of the European Cup).     法国队将比利时队淘汰（出欧洲杯足球赛）了.
He has lost his belief in God.     他已不相信上帝了。 The story of his miseries is beyond my belief.     他的悲惨身世令人难以置信。
We believe in his ability.     我们相信他的才干。 I believe it to have been a mistake.     我认为这一直就是错的。
Can you hear the morning bell ringing?     你能听到晨钟响吗? The bell is knelling.     丧钟已经敲响。
My belly is empty.     我肚子饿了。 A hungry belly has no ears.     人肚子饿了就听不进道理。
That dictionary belongs to me.     那本字典是属于我的。 What party do you belong to?     你属于哪一党派？
She is my beloved.     她是我的爱人。 He is beloved by all.     他是众人所爱戴的。

I am bound by my promise.     我必须遵守自己的诺言。 Their refusal to sign the contract has put us in a bit of a bind.     他们拒绝签约&从而使我们的处境有些困难。

column2: n. 缚者&用以绑缚之物&夹器

A substance& especially an enzyme& that initiates or modifies the rate of a chemical reaction in a living body; a biochemical catalyst.     生物催化剂能在活的体内产生化学反应或改变生物体内化学反应速度的物质&尤指酶；生物化学催化剂 The theory that microorganisms or biochemical compounds from outer space are responsible for originating life on Earth and possibly in other parts of the universe where suitable atmospheric conditions exist.     有生源说&胚种论一种学说&认为来自宇宙空间的微生物或生物化学物是地球上生命的起源&并且在宇宙的其他部分可能有适合的大气状况存在
Her research is breaking new ground in biochemistry.     她的研究正在开辟生物化学的新开地。 I am going to start my doctorate in biochemistry next year.     我准备明年开始攻读生物化学博士学位。

The school has a large biological laboratory.     这所学校有一个很大的生物实验室。 Biological warfare is terrible.     生物战很可怕。
We have a biology lesson tomorrow.     明天我们有堂生物学课。 He worked hard at his biology.     他努力学习生物学。

The early bird catches the worm.     早起的鸟儿有虫吃。（捷足先登。） The crow is a bird of ill omen.     乌鸦是不祥的预兆。

column2: n. 勒索 v. 勒索

column2: n. 过失&责备 v. 责备

The logic operator is the OR operator.     布尔代数中的一种运算&它同时对两个二进制数字进行如下操作：如果一个数或二个数为1&则结果为1；如果二个数均为零&则结果为零。它的逻辑算符是OR运算符。

He is chained to his work.     他工作忙得不能分身。 He chained his bicycle to the post.     他把自行车拴到柱子上。

column2: n. 椅子&席位&讲座 v. 担任（某事务）的主席
column3: The old chair gave a groan when the fat man sat down on it.     那个胖子坐下时&旧椅子发出嘎吱的响声。 Father sits in the same chair every evening.     父亲每晚都坐在同一张椅子上&
He was elected chairman of the meeting.     他被选为会议主席。 We were appalled when we heard that the chairman had been murdered.     听说主席被谋杀&我们都吓坏了。

column2: n. 粉笔 v. 用粉笔写&记录
column3: The teacher wrote on the blackboard with a piece of chalk.     老师用一支粉笔在黑板上写字。 Dust yourself down you're covered in chalk.     把你自己身上掸掸--上面都是粉笔末.

column2: n. 挑战 v. 向...挑战
column3: Nowadays no one will challenge the fact that the earth is round.     现在没有人会对地球是圆的这一事实提出异议。 This career offers a challenge.     这份职业具有挑战性。

column2: n. 室&房间&会所&枪膛 v. 放在枪膛内&关在室内
column3: The judge met the two lawyers in his chambers.     法官在他的办公室里会见了两位律师。 In Britain the upper Chamber is the House of Lords& and the lower the House of Commons.     英国上院即贵族院&下院即众议院。
Why don't we crack open a bottle of champagne to celebrate?     我们何不开瓶香槟酒庆祝一下呢？ He was drinking cheap champagne with a raffish air.     他喝著廉价的香槟酒& 样子十分放荡.

column2: n. 冠军&拥护者 v. 保卫&拥护
column3: He was the world tennis champion.     他曾是世界网球冠军。 The leader of a cause; a champion.     领导者一项事业的领导；拥护者
The championship will be held next week.     锦标赛将于下周举行。 She's going for the double this year& the Olympics and the World Championship.     今年她要争取奥林匹克赛和世界杯冠军赛的双料冠军.

column2: n. 机会&意外 v. 偶然发生&试试看
column3: A chance meeting brought the two old friends together again.     偶然的相遇使两位老朋友重新聚首。 I never miss a chance of playing football.     我从不错过踢足球的机会。

column2: n. 英大臣(使馆秘书&首相)
column3: The most important judge in Britain is the Lord Chancellor.     英国最重要的法官是大法官。 The chancellor is the most powerful man in the Austrian government.     首相是奥地利政府最有实权的人。

column2: n. 变化&零钱 v. 改变
column3: If we are to avoid defeat we need a change of leadership.     我们要避免失败的话&就要换掉领导人。 How much have you got in change?     你有多少零钱？

column2: n. 通道&频道&海峡 v. 引导&开导&形成河道
column3: Ships must follow the channel into the port.     船只必须沿航道进入港口。 This channel comes on the air every morning at 7 am.     这个频道每天早晨7点钟开始播放.

column2: n. 圣歌&赞美诗 v. 呤唱&诵扬
column3: Chant a prayer.     唱赞美诗 A Gregorian chant.     格列高利圣歌
After the failure of the electricity supplies the city was in chaos.     电力供应中断&城市陷于混乱之中。 He sees that human stupidity and greed are about to plunge Europe into chaos.     他看到人间的愚蠢和贪婪即将使欧洲陷入一片混乱。

column2: n. 小伙子 v. 皲裂
column3: His chapped lips were bleeding.     他干裂的嘴唇流出血来。 Poor chap& his wife has just died.     不幸的小伙子啊& 他刚刚死了妻子.
They go to chapel every Sunday evening.     他们每个星期天晚上做礼拜。 The ghost of Lady Margaret is supposed to haunt this chapel.     据说玛格丽特女士的鬼魂常在这个礼拜堂出没.
I had nearly finished chapter 8.     我就要把第8章看完了。 The opening chapter gives a general overview of the subject.     开篇第一章是对主题的概述.

column2: n. 木炭(散工&茶&字符) vt 烧成炭(做散工)

column3: I wish this book was written in bigger character.     我希望这本书的字再大一点儿。 The statements were of political character.     这种声明具有政治性质。

column2: a. 特有的&典型的 n. 特性&特征&特色
column3: Sympathy is the feeling characteristic of mankind.     同情心是人类特有的感情。 Ambition is a characteristic of all successful businessmen.     雄心勃勃是所有成功生意人的共同特点。

column2: v. 表示...的特色&赋予...特色
column3: Your work is characterized by lack of attention to details.     你的工作特点是缺乏对细节的注意。 He may be characterized as a man of hobbies.     他可以被称作是一个有癖好的人。

column2: n. 电荷&指控&费用 v. 控诉&加罪于&要价&赊帐&充电&管理
column3: As long as you've paid in advance we won't charge you for delivery.     只要你预先付款&我们就不收你送货费。 He became his uncle's charge after his parents died.     他在父母去世後&由叔父抚养。

column2: a. 仁慈的、宽厚的 n. 慈善机关(团体)&仁慈&宽厚
column3: She was always very generous in her charity.     她行善时总是很慷慨。 She regards his moral faults with charity.     她宽恕他的品行不端。

column2: n. 吸引力&魔力&魅力 v. 迷人&使...迷醉&用符咒
column3: Her charm of manner made her very popular.     她风度优雅&备受欢迎。 Her graciousness charmed everyone at the party.     她的风采令社交聚会上的每一个人倾倒。
I found Susan a very charming person.     我发现苏珊是个非常可爱的人。 The picture showed a charming pastoral scene of cows drinking from a stream.     这幅画表现了牛在溪边饮水的迷人的田园风光。

column2: n. 图表 v. 制成图表
column3: The pilot charted the plane's course.     飞行员制定了飞机的航线。 Can you read the weather chart?     你能看懂气象图吗？

column2: n. 特许状&执照&宪章 v. 特许&发给特许执照
column3: The holiday-makers chartered a boat to go fishing.     渡假者租了一艘船去钓鱼。 The company was granted a charter trade in the occupied territory.     这家公司被授予特权&可以在被占领地区进行贸易活动。

column2: n. 追求&狩猎 v. 追捕&追逐&在金属上打花样
column3: We must chase the enemy from our country.     我们必须把敌人赶出我国。 They caught the puppy after a long chase.     他们追了很久才把小狗逮住。
There is always a vast chasm between rich and poor.     贫富的鸿沟始终存在。 The chasm between you and he can not be solved by us.     你和他之间的裂痕不是我们能解决的。

column2: a. 贞洁的&纯洁的&朴素的
column3: She was a holy woman& innocent and chaste.     她是一个圣洁的女人&天真而忠贞。 Not chaste or modest.     不贞洁的&淫荡的

column2: 聊天&闲谈 v. 谈天&闲谈
column3: It is pleasant to chat with friends& and with no chat is it more pleasant than with close friends.     和朋友聊天是愉快的&而这种情形没有比和知己的朋友聊天更为愉快。 Ask him to stop by for a chat.     请他来坐坐& 聊聊天.

column2: a. 便宜的 ad. 便宜地
column3: I hate this kind of cheap emotion.     我讨厌这种肤浅的感情。 Her shoes look cheap.     她的那双鞋看上去很便宜。

column2: n. 骗子&欺骗行为 v. 欺骗&作弊
column3: His father was cheated of his land.     他的父亲被人骗走了地产。 He never cheats to pass examination.     他考试从不作弊。

column2: n. 检查&支票&阻止物 v. 检查&阻止&核对
column3: I'm just going to check in these books at the library.     我要去图书馆还这些书。 They checked their steps.     他们突然停住脚步。

column2: n. 检验器(检查员&方格) vt 制成方格式(交错)
column3: The checker checks on the quality of our products.     检查者检查我们的产品的质量。 The checker made a check on all the victims' friends.     检查者对所有受害者的朋友进行了调查。

column2: n. 检查(调整&验算&检查输出结果&工时扣除)
column3: Be there an express checkout service?     有没有快速退房手续的服务？

column2: n. 审查&检定&健康检查
column3: For the present we are made a general checkup.     目前&我们正做总的检查。 I went to see my doctor and had a checkup yesterday.     昨天我去请医生作了一次检查。

column2: n. 面颊&脸蛋 v. 粗鲁地向...讲
column3: She kissed him on both cheeks.     她吻了他的双颊。 I'm going to put up with your cheek!     我可不想容忍你这个厚脸皮。

column2: n. 愉快&激励&欢呼 v. 加油&鼓舞&快活起来
column3: He's always full of cheer in summer.     夏天他总是高高兴兴的。 They cheered loudly for their football team.     他们大声地为自己的足球队喊加油。
She remained cheerful throughout the trip.     旅行中她始终兴致勃勃。 I have a cozy and cheerful room.     我有一个舒适的令人愉快的房间。
There are many kinds of cheese.     奶酪有许多种。 We had a homely meal of bread and cheese.     我们吃了一顿面包加乳酪的家常便餐。

I commended the chef on the excellent meal. I later wrote to commend him to his employer& the restaurant owner.     我称赞厨师做的菜味道好. 随後我给雇用他的餐馆老板写了封信表扬他. The chef sprinkle poppy seed on the cake.     厨师往蛋糕上撒罂粟籽。

column2: a. 化学的 n. 化学制品
column3: We are doing a chemical experiment.     我们正在做化学实验。 My major is the subject of chemical engineering.     我的专业是化学工程学。
I bought aspirin at the chemist's on the corner.     我在大街拐角的药房买了阿司匹林。 The chemist made a mistake when making up the prescription.     药剂师配错了药.
We have three periods of chemistry a week.     我们一星期三节化学课。 I prefer chemistry to physics.     我喜欢化学甚于物理。
Payments by cheque easily outnumbered cash transactions.     用支票付款在数量上大大超过现金交易。 They forged their manager's signature on the cheque.     他们在支票上伪造了经理的签名。
One of our cherished privileges is the right of free speech.     我们所珍视的权利之一是言论自由。 A mother cherishes her baby.     母亲疼爱孩子。
He went to the cherry orchard to see flowers.     他去樱桃园看花。 We have different pies& such as apple& cherry& and strawberry pies.     我们有不同的派&例如苹果、樱桃和草莓派。
Chess is played by two people.     国际象棋是两个人玩的。 I like to play chess with my father.     我喜欢和爸爸一起下国际象棋。
He put some food into the ice chest.     他把一些食物放进冰箱里。 The doctor gave him an examination to see if he had chest trouble.     医生给他做了检查&看他是否有肺病。

column2: n. 栗子 a. 栗色的
column3: These chestnuts are of bright reddish-brown.     这些栗子是鲜亮的红褐色。 Grab yourself a roast chestnut.     你自己拿一只烤栗子吧。
You must chew your food well before you swallow it.     食物吞下去之前先要细细咀嚼。 I'll think about it while I have a chew.     我吃饭时会想想看。

column2: n. 别致的款式&流行样式&时尚 a. 别致的
column3: She dresses with chic.     她穿着高雅。 Chic clothes; a chic boutique.     时髦的服装；一件雅致的饰物
She cabled the good news about her arrival in Chicago.     她打电报说她已顺利到达芝加哥。 The flight is routed to Chicago via New York.     这个航班被安排经纽约飞往芝加哥。
He has a chicken farm.     他有一个养鸡场。 There was fried chicken for dinner.     有炸鸡肉作晚餐。

column2: a. 主要的&首席的 n. 首领
column3: The chief of the police department demanded severe punishments for criminals.     警察局长要求严惩罪犯。 What is the chief town in Norway?     挪威的主要城市是哪一个？
Bread is chiefly made of flour.     面包主要是由面粉做成的。 The government's revenue is made up chiefly of the money we pay in taxes.     政府的收入主要来源是靠我们所交的税。
My wife lost her first child a month before it should have been born.     我太太在产前一个月流产了第一胎。 Moses led the children of Israel out of the Egypt.     摩西率领以色列的子民离开了埃及。
Epidurals are now often used during childbirth.     现在分娩时常用硬膜外注射. The mother died in childbirth.     那个母亲死於分娩。
They spend their childhood in happiness.     他们幸福地度过童年。 Mankind learns its first language in early childhood.     人类是在幼年开始学习第一种语言的。
The little girl spoke in a high childish voice.     小女孩说话时声音尖尖的&带着童音。 They derided his efforts as childish.     他们嘲笑他的做法很幼稚。

column2: n. 孩子们(child的复数形式)
column3: It's very important to teach the children about road safety.     把交通安全常识教给孩子们是非常重要的。 The children are rushing about.     孩子们到处乱闯。

column2: n. 寒冷&寒意&失意 a. 寒冷的&冷漠的 v. 使...寒心&冷冻
column3: The sight sent a chill to her heart.     这情景使她心寒。 There was a chill in the air this morning.     今天早上有点冷冰冰的。
He had a chilly welcome of our coming.     他冷淡地迎接我们的到来。 It's a chilly morning.     这是一个寒冷的早晨。
The factory chimneys poured smoke into the air.     工厂的烟囱向空中排烟。 Volumes of black smoke poured fromthe chimney.     烟囱里冒出来团团黑烟.
Some folks seem to have descend from the chimpanzee much later than others.     有些人&看来像是比其他人晚了好久才从黑猩猩分支而传下来的后裔。
He was so fat that he had a double chin.     他胖得有双下巴了。 His chin was covered with bristles.     他的下巴上长满了胡子茬。
China is an oriental country with a long history.     中国是一个有着悠久历史的东方国家。 This set of ancient china is invaluable.     这套古瓷器非常珍贵。

column2: a. 中国的 n. 汉语&中国人
column3: Chinese people are working hard to make the country richer and more beautiful.     中国人民正在努力工作&把国家建设得更加富饶美丽。 I'm proud I am Chinese.     我骄傲我是中国人。

column2: n. 薄片&芯片 v. 削&切&削成碎片
column3: The entire content of a book will be located on a single silicon chip.     整本书的内容只用一片硅芯片就可以装下。 The paint has chipped off where the table touches the wall.     桌子接触墙壁的地方漆皮已剥落。

column2: n. 凿子 v. 用凿子刻&雕&凿 vt. 凿&雕&凿子&錾子
column3: He cut the figure of a woman out of that rock with a chisel.     他用凿子把那块石头刻成了一个女人像。 He chiseled that rock into the figure of a woman.     他把那块石头凿成一个女人像。
Chlorophyll is a green substance in plants that absorbs energy from sunlight and helps them grow.     叶绿素是生长在植物中的绿色物质&它能吸收阳光&促进植物生长。
Never eat chocolate before dinner.     饭前不要吃巧克力。 Would you like a cup of chocolate?     你想要杯巧克力饮料吗？

column2: a. 上等的&精选的 n. 选择
column3: She can exercise little choice.     她几乎没有选择余地。 They are the choice of the men.     他们是队伍中的精英。

column2: n. 唱诗班&唱诗班的席位
column3: He is a member of the choir.     他是唱诗班的一员。 The choir sang the amens beautifully.     唱诗班唱的阿门非常优美.
An old woman was found choked to death.     发现一个老妇人被掐死了。 She choked with emotion.     她激动得说不出话来。
Have you chosen a coat yet?     你挑好了上衣没有？ He chose not to go home until later.     他决定晚一点才回家。

column2: n. 厚肉片&排骨 v. 剁碎&砍&切
column3: He chopped in with a sarcastic remark.     他突然插进一句讽刺的话。 She chopped the block of wood in two with a single blow.     她一斧头把木块劈成两半。
This story may strike a chord for other women in the same situation.     这个故事会触动其他与她处境相同的妇女的心弦。 He struck a chord on the piano.     他在钢琴上敲出和音。
She finds shopping a chore.     她认为买东西是烦人的事. All this was done to relieve women of household chores.     这一切都是为了把妇女从家务劳动中解放出来。
The papers all chorused the praises of the President.     各报都异口同声地对总统表示赞扬。 The chorus is dressed as fairies.     歌舞队的人都装扮成仙子。

column2: int. 天啊! n. 基督
column3: To Christians& Jesus Christ is the Savior.     对基督徒来说&主耶稣是他们的救世主。 Apostles were sent out by Christ to spread his teachings.     基督派基督十二使徒之一宣传他的教义。

column2: a. 基督教的 n. 基督教徒
column3: He is an earnest Christian.     他是一个虔诚的基督教徒。 The man was excommunicated from the Christian Church.     那人被驱逐出基督教会。
Merry Christmas!     圣诞快乐！ We usually sing carols at Christmas.     圣诞节时&我们一般会唱颂歌。
There is a chronic unemployment problem in America.     在美国存在长期失业问题。 My brother has chronic bronchitis.     我的哥哥患有慢性支气管炎。

A literary or cinematic device in which an earlier event is inserted into the normal chronological order of a narrative.     倒叙&闪回镜头一种文学或电影的表现手法&往往在一段按正常时间顺序记叙的叙事中插入一件以前发生过的事情 A period of time as reckoned from a specific date serving as the basis of its chronological system.     年代从某一具体日期算起的一段时间&也用作其年代系统的根据

column2: n. 大块&矮胖的人或物
column3: I've completed a fair chunk of my article.     我已经把文章的一大部分写完了. The giant shovel is biting off big chunks from the hill.     巨型铲土机正在把小山头一大口一大口地啃掉。
I'm just going to the church to see the priest.     我正要去教堂去见见牧师。 The Church has a duty to condemn violence.     基督徒有责任谴责暴力。
He lit up a cigar.     他点燃了雪茄。 He fired up a cigar.     他点着一支雪茄烟。
In our city& the shops were not allowed to sell cigarettes to students.     在我市&商店不准把香烟卖给学生。 A cigarette thrown into the woods in dry weather may start a fire.     在天气干燥时把点燃的香烟扔进树林可能会引起火灾。
The crowd swarmed out of the cinema after the film ended.     电影结束后&人们从电影院蜂拥而出。 There is a telephone booth near the cinema.     电影院附近有一个电话亭。

column2: n. 零&暗号 v. 计算&做算术
column3: The cipher took me three weeks before I hit it.     我费了3个多星期才把这密码解释出来。 The army uses a special cipher so that military messages are kept secret.     ＂军队使用一种特殊密码&军事电讯因此得以保密。＂

column2: n. 圆周&社交圈&循环 v. 包围&盘旋&环绕
column3: The plane circled the airport before landing.     飞机在着陆之前在机场上空盘旋。 He has a large circle of friends.     他有一大群朋友。
The rocket did one circuit of the earth and returned to base.     火箭绕地球运行一周后返回基地。 There are two breakers in this circuit.     这个电路里面使用了两个断路器。

column2: a. 循环的&圆形的 n. 传单&通报
column3: The full moon has a circular form.     满月呈圆形。 Stop giving me circular explanations and tell me what really happened.     别拐弯抹角地解释了&告诉我究竟发生了什么。
Please open a window to allow the air to circulate.     打开窗子让空气流通。 Blood circulates through the body.     血液在体内循环。
This magazine has a large circulation.     这本杂志发行量很大。 These ideas have been in circulation for some time.     这些想法已经流行了一段时间。

An excess of blood in the circulatory system or in one organ or area.     多血在循环系统或在一个器官或区域中的血过多 A condition marked by an abnormally large number of red blood cells in the circulatory system.     红细胞增多症以循环系统中存在不正常的大量红细胞为特征的状况
The circumference of the earth is almost 25&000 miles.     地球的圆周长约为两万五千英里。 The distance around something; the circumference.     周围&四周围绕某物的距离；周围
Due to circumstances beyond our control the lecture was cancelled.     由于无法控制的情况&讲座取消了。 He was forced by the circumstances to do this.     他做此事是为环境所迫。

column2: n. 情况&情形&环境(常用复数)

column2: a. 作为结果的&随之发生的

He had been ill for a long time and consequently he was behind in his work.     他病了很久&因此耽误了功课。 John was building a small house& but it was blown down in the storm. Consequently& he was back to square one and had to start all over again.     约翰正在建造一幢小房子&但是在暴风雨中房子被吹倒了。结果他又回到了原状&只得重新开始。
Most people have come to accept the need for conservation of natural resources.     现在大多数人已认识到保护自然资源的必要。 Who discovered the conservation of energy?     谁发现了能量守恒？

Considered the founder of modern astronomy& he formulated three laws to clarify the theory that the planets revolve around the sun.     开普勒&约翰尼斯1571－1630德国天文学家和数学家&被认为是现代天文学的奠基人&他创立了三大定律&说明行星围绕太阳转的理论 The temple has been considered an example of classic design.     人们认为这座神庙是古典式设计的范例。

column2: n. 稠度(一致性&相容性)

The consolidation of bones or their parts to form a single unit.     关节强直使骨和其它部位强直并形成一体 Let's collect the sap before its consolidation into a hard mass.     让我们在树液坚固成团之前将之收集起来。

This factory was constructed by our company.     这家工厂是由我们公司建设的。 A dam constructed across a stream to raise the water level so that the overflow will have sufficient power to turn a mill wheel.     磨坊水坝横跨溪流建造的堤坝&以提高水位使溢满的水有足够的动力转动磨坊的水轮

Conversely& intelligent beings which are just beginning to develop on remote worlds may be ready to pick up our signals in thousands of years.     反过来说&其他星球上的刚刚开始进化的智力生命&他们要过几千年之后&也许才可能收到我们的信号。 Conversely& work in applied science and technology frequently acts as a direct stimulus to the development of pure science.     相反&应用科学技术的成果在纯科学的发展中经常起到直接的促进作用。

column3: Elevated in character; exalted.     品德高尚的；崇高的 He was exalted to the position of general manager.     他被提升到总经理的职位。
He didn't pass the exam& but it was a good attempt.     他虽然没有通过考试&但他做了很大的努力。 He studied hard& and in consequence he passed the exam.     他努力学习&因此通过了考试。
The examination of all the witness lasted two hours.     对全部证人的讯问持续了两个小时。 I will take an examination tomorrow.     明天我将参加一场考试。

column2: v. 检查&调查&考试 [计算机] 检测
column3: The doctor examined her carefully.     医生仔细检查了她的身体。 The policeman who was sent down to examine& says me house has been broken open on the most scientific principles.     派来调查的警察说&我家的大门是根据极其合乎科学的原理给撬开来的。
Her diligence has set an example to the others.     她的勤奋为其他人树立了榜样。 This church is a classic example of medieval architecture.     这座教堂是中世纪建筑风格的典型实例。
She was exasperated at his stupidity.     她因为他的愚笨而发怒。 That child exasperates me.     那孩子真让我生气。
`Stop that noise&' he cried out in exasperation.     ｀不要发出那种噪音&＇他愤怒地大喊.
Excavate an ore-rich hillside.     在富矿山上挖洞穴

column2: v. 超过&胜过&越出 vt. 超过&胜过
column3: Demand began to exceed supply.     开始供不应求。 His knowledge of history exceeds mine.     他的历史知识超过我。

column2: ad. 非常(极其&极度地&很)
column3: We found out that he was exceedingly fond of fishing.     我们发现他极其喜欢钓鱼。 My teacher asked me to answer an exceedingly difficult question.     老师让我回答一个非常难的问题。

column2: v. 胜过&优于&擅长 [计算机] 软件名称
column3: He excels all other composers of his period.     他超过了同时期的所有其他作曲家。 He excels in painting.     他擅长绘画。
We all praised the excellence of her cooking.     我们都称赞了她烹饪技术的高超。 The firm is a byword for excellence.     这家商号是优质的保证.
He worked out an excellent idea.     他想出了一个极好的主意。 Your examination results are excellent.     你的考试成绩优异。

column2: v. 除&除外&反对 prep. 除了...之外&若不是&除非
column3: I excepted James from my invitation.     我没有邀请詹姆斯。 They all went to sleep except me.     除我之外&他们都去睡觉了。
Most children like sweets& but there are some exceptions.     大多数孩子都喜欢吃糖果&但也有一些例外。 He took great exception to what I said.     他极力反对我的话。

column2: a. 例外的&异常的&特别的
column3: This weather is exceptional for June.     六月里这样的天气是反常的。 We've enjoyed an exceptional run of fine weather recently.     我们这里最近天气好极了.

column2: n. 摘录 v. 摘录&摘要 vt. 摘&引用
column3: An excerpt from one of these letters& read as part of a religious service.     使徒书信节选从使徒书信中选取的&作为宗教仪式或活动的一部分来诵读的一段 A closely linked series& especially of excerpted writings or commentaries.     连锁系列紧密相接的系列&尤指节录作品或评论

column2: a. 过量的&附加的 n. 超过&超越&过度&过量
column3: The fat boy went on a diet to get rid of his excess weight.     这个胖男孩节制饮食以减轻过量的体重。 Usury is interest in excess of a legal rate.     高利贷是指超过法定利率取息。
Excessive rainfall had made the harvest impossible.     雨量过多&丰收已经不可能了。 I consider the excessive smoking and drinking tend to cloud the brain.     我认为过多的抽烟和过量的酗酒&会使人的头脑迟钝。

column2: n. 交换&汇兑&交易所 v. 交换&交易&兑换
column3: A soldier was wounded in the exchange.     一名士兵在交火中受伤。 We exchanged our opinions about the event at the meeting.     在会上&我们就此事交换了意见。

column2: a. 可交换的&可兑换的&可替换的
column3: Sale goods in this shop are not exchangeable.     本店货物售出概不退换. A commodity& such as gold& or an officially issued coin or paper note that is legally established as an exchangeable equivalent of all other commodities& such as goods and services& and is used as a measure of their comparative values on the market.     钱&货币&纸币一种商品&如金子或官方发行的铸币或纸币&把这种货币或纸币定为可与其他一切商品、如货物和服务的等价交换物&并用作市场交换价值的尺度

column2: n. 货物税&国产税 vt. 收税&切除
column3: The censor insisted on excising the passage from the film.     电影审查员坚持剪去影片的这一段. The surgeon excised the lump from her breast.     外科医生切除了她乳房的肿块.

column2: n. 切除&删除&切除之物
column3: The excision& if not done in time& tends to complications.     如不及时切除&可能导致并发症。 The surgical excision of one or both of the adrenal glands.     肾上腺切除术一个或一对肾上腺的外科切除手术
The good news excited everybody.     这个好消息使每一个人都很兴奋。 Your remark excited him to jealousy.     你的话引起了他的嫉妒。
The boys broke into shrill& excited cheering.     男孩子们突然迸发出刺耳的兴奋的欢呼声。 I was so excited to see snow that I was indifferent to the cold.     我看到雪激动得连寒冷都不在乎了。
He kept calm amid all these excitements.     他在这些使人激动的事件中保持镇静。 The boys were running in excitement.     男孩们兴奋地跑来跑去。
What exciting news this is!     这是多么令人兴奋的消息！ That is an exciting game.     那是一场令人兴奋的比赛。
The newspapers exclaimed against the government's action.     报纸指责政府的行动。 She exclaimed at the beautiful view.     她对这美丽的景色感到惊奇。
"Good heavens!" is an exclamation of surprise.     “天哪！”是一个表示惊讶的感叹语。 My sainted aunt! ie as an exclamation expressing surprise.     我的妈呀! （表示惊讶的用语）.

column2: v. 除外&排除&拒绝 [计算机] 排除
column3: We cannot exclude the possibility that he killed his wife.     我们不能排除他杀了他妻子的可能性。 No one was excluded from sentry duty.     人人都得站岗放哨。
The exclusion of women from the temple made them feel sad.     妇女被排斥于寺院之外使得她们很难过。 He spends his spare time gardening& to the exclusion of all other interests.     他把空余时间都用在园艺上了&没有任何其他爱好。

column2: a. 独占的&唯一的&排外的 [计算机] 互斥的
column3: This company has exclusive rights for the sale of Ford cars in the city.     这家公司享有福特汽车在本市的独家经销权。 Dictionary-making has not been his exclusive employment.     编字典一直都不是他唯一的工作。

column2: ad. 排他地(独占地&专门地&仅仅&只)
column3: He writes exclusively for China Daily.     他专给《中国日报》写稿。 This room is exclusively for women.     这个房间是供妇女专用的。
The pavement was covered with dogs' excrement.     便道上满是狗屎。 A piece of excrement.     屎蛋&粪一块排泄物
Dogs are not permitted to foul (ie excrete on) the pavement.     禁止狗在人行道上便溺.

Serving to carry waste out of the body; excretory.     排泄的用来把废物带出体外的；排泄的 The excretory opening of the digestive tract in animals such as birds& reptiles& amphibians& and fish.     肛门鸟、爬行动物、两栖动物以及鱼等动物的消化道的排泄口
We shall make an excursion to Hangzhou this weekend.     这个周末我们将去杭州旅行。 The excursion was the high spot of our holiday.     我们那个假日的最大乐趣是远足。

column2: n. 借口&理由；低劣的样品 v. 原谅
column3: Please excuse my bad handwriting.     请原谅我的字写得不好。 His excuse for being late was that he had missed the train.     他迟到的理由是没有赶上火车。
A program that translates a source program into an executable program(an object program).     一种把源程序翻译成可执行程序（即目标程序）的程序。

column2: v. 执行&实行&完成 [计算机] 执行
column3: The nurse executed the doctor's orders.     护士执行医生的命令。 Congress makes the laws; the President executes them.     国会制定法律&总统执行法律。
There used to be public executions.     处决囚犯过去都是公开执行的。 The artillery did great execution.     这种大炮的威力很大。

column2: a. 行政的 n. 执行者&主管
column3: The President of the United States is the chief executive.     美国总统是行政首脑。 He is a man of great executive ability.     他是个具有极高管理才能的人。
He was appointed to act as the executor.     他被指定为遗嘱执行人。 The executor shared out the estate.     遗嘱执行人把遗产分给各人。
This painting exemplifies the artist's early style.     这幅画是该画家早期艺术风格的典型. The recent oil price rises exemplify the difficulties which the motor industry is now facing.     最近的石油涨价是汽车工业正面临的困难的一个例子。

column2: n. 免税者&被免除义务者 a. 免除的 v. 使免除
column3: Poor eyesight will exempt you from military service.     视力不佳将使你免服兵役。 These houses are exempt from paying rates.     这些房子是免付捐税的。

An exemption from a church law& a vow& or another similar obligation granted in a particular case by an ecclesiastical authority.     特许&赦免在特定情况下&由教会当权者授权赦免的教会法律、誓约或其他类似的义务的免除 The document containing this exemption.     特许状包含这种特许的文件

column2: n. 练习&作业&运动 v. 练习&运动&运用
column3: What others think exercises a great influence on most of us.     别人怎样想对我们多半会产生很大影响。 If you don't get more exercise& you'll get fat.     如果你不多作运动&就会发胖。

column2: v. 发挥&运用&施以影响
column3: Her husband exerted a lot of pressure on her to succeed.     她丈夫殷切地希望她能成功&给了她很大的压力。 He exerted all his influence to make them accept his plan.     他用尽一切影响力使他们接受他的计划。
Now that I'm 90& I find the exertions of travelling too great.     我已经年届90&出远门已力不从心。 Physical or mental exertion& especially when difficult or exhausting; work.     劳动体力或脑力的运用&尤指出现困难或精疲力尽时；工作
She exhaled slowly to show her annoyance.     她长叹以示厌烦。 He lit his cigar and exhaled smoke.     他点燃雪茄&然后吐出烟雾。

column2: n. 排气&排气装置 v. 用尽&耗尽&使...精疲力尽 [计算机] 排除
column3: She did not cry out; her tears were exhausted.     她哭不出来了&因为眼泪都已哭干了。 The exhaust pipe shot sparks.     排气管中射出了火星。

column2: v. 取尽(排出&详细讨论&包括) a. 用完的
column3: The exhausted troops surrendered.     部队人困马乏结果投降了。 The tail exhaust pipe of the motor vehicle emitted poisonous smoke.     机动车的尾部排气管排出有毒的浓烟。

column2: n. 疲惫&筋疲力尽&竭尽
column3: The mine was closed owing to exhaustion.     这个煤矿因矿源枯竭而被关闭。 He is in a state of exhaustion.     他在疲惫状态中。

column2: a. 无遗漏的&彻底的&详尽的
column3: An exhaustive study.     一项彻底的研究

column2: n. 展览品&陈列品&展览 v. 展现&陈列&展览 [计算机] 呈现
column3: Many unearthed cultural relics were exhibited at the museum.     博物馆展出了许多出土文物。 She exhibited great powers of endurance during the climb.     她在攀登过程中表现出极大的耐力。
Did you see the art exhibition downtown?     你看了闹市区的美术展览吗？ People at the party were embarrassed when Frank got drunk and made an exhibition of himself.     弗兰克喝醉了&出尽洋相&使参加聚会的人很难为情。

column2: v. 使高兴的&使愉快的

column3: The chairman exhorted the party workers to take action.     主席敦促党的工作人员采取行动。 He often exhorts Mary to work harder.     他经常勉励玛丽要更加努力工作。

column2: n. 放逐&流放&被放逐者 v. 放逐&流放
column3: He was exiled from the country for one year.     他被放逐一年。 The king was sent into exile.     国王遭到放逐。
The Roman Empire existed for several centuries.     罗马帝国存在了几百年。 Man cannot exist without air.     没有空气人就不能生存。
The newspaper ceased to appear after an existence of three months.     该报发行3 个月后停刊了。 The family lived a precarious existence.     这家人过着朝不保夕的生活。

We should make a better use of the existing equipment.     我们应该更好地利用现有设备。 In computer security& any weakness or flaw existing in a system& the susceptibility of a system to a specific threat attack or harmful event& or the opportunity available to a threat agent to mount that attack.     在计算机安全学中&存在于一个系统内的弱点或缺陷&系统对一个特定的威胁攻击或危险事件的敏感性&或进行攻击的威胁作用的可能性。

column2: n. 出口&退场&离去 v. 退出&脱离
column3: At the end of the third scene the actress exits.     该女演员于第三场结束时退场。 There are four emergency exits in the department store.     这家百货公司有四个紧急出口。

column2: v. 免除责任&确定无罪 vt. 使免罪

column3: The practice of lending money and charging the borrower interest& especially at an exorbitant or illegally high rate.     高利贷借给他人钱并要求贷者付很高的利息的做法&尤其利息异常地或非法地高
The film retains much of the book's exotic flavour.     这部电影保存了原著的许多异国情调. Exotic tropical plants in a greenhouse.     温室里引进的热带植物

column2: v. 使...膨胀&详述&扩张 [计算机] 扩充
column3: The petals of many flowers expand in the sunshine.     许多花的花瓣在阳光中绽放。 Our foreign trade has expanded during recent years.     近年来我们的对外贸易有所扩大。
The expanding economy enriched the peasants.     不断发展的经济使农民们富裕起来。 The project was predicated on the assumption that the economy was expanding.     这一计划是以经济发展的设想为依据的.
Metals undergo expansion when heated.     金属加热时会膨胀。 This book is an expansion of the play he wrote before.     这本书是他以前写的剧本的扩充。
The journey was not as nice as we had expected.     旅途不象我们预想的那样好。 I will do what is expected of me.     我会尽本分的。
Women have a higher life expectancy than men.     女人比男人的预期寿命长. A quiver of expectancy ran through the audience.     全场引颈以待& 群情鼎沸.

column2: n. 期待&期望 v. 期待&前程
column3: He has great expectations from his uncle.     他渴望从叔叔那继承大笔遗产。 She ate a light lunch in expectation of a good dinner.     她午饭吃得很少&期待晚饭时饱餐一顿。
He acted from expediency& not from principle.     他为求达到目的& 丧失了原则.

column2: n. 权宜之计&临时手段 a. 权宜的&方便的&有用的
column3: He thought it expedient not to tell his wife where he had been.     他认为不告诉妻子他去过哪里是适宜的。 As he had forgot his keys& he got into the house by the simple expedient of climbing through the window.     他由于忘了带钥匙&便以简单的应急办法从窗户爬进屋里。
Expedite offer afraid buyer ready withdraw as others contact him.     糨公司正与之接触&请速予报价&否则买主准备撤走。 Shipment is ready& expedite credit.     船已装完&请速开信用证。
The mail is conveyed with expedition.     那封信被迅速地传递出去。 They planned to organize a scientific expedition.     他们计划组织一次科学考察。
He was expelled from the school.     他被学校开除了。 The bullet was expelled from the gun.     子弹从枪中射出。
I had expended much time on the work but they told me it's useless.     我花了很多时间在这件工作上&他们却告诉我说这是无用的。 The soldiers expended all their ammunition in that fight.     士兵在那场战斗中用尽了所有的弹药。

column2: n. (时间、劳力、金钱等)支出&使用&消耗
column3: The expenditure of money on weapons is very large.     购置武器的开支很大。 Limit your expenditure to what is essential.     你要把开销限制在必要的范围内。
It's too much of an expense for me to own a car.     对我来说&拥有一辆汽车的花费太大。 He finished the job at the expenses of his health.     他以牺牲健康完成了这项工作。
The incidental expenses of cars in this city are expensive.     这个城市汽车的附加费用很昂贵。 Could you detail all your expenses on this form?     请把你的各项开支列在这张表格上&好吗？
The dress is too expensive for me to buy.     那衣服太昂贵&我买不起。 The manufacture of these small components is expensive.     制造这些小部件是非常昂贵的。

column2: n. 经历&经验 v. 经历&体验
column3: He experienced great difficulty in getting a visa to leave the country.     他申请出国签证经历了很大的困难。 We learn from the past& experience the present and hope for success in the future.     我们从过去中学习&体验现在&展望未来的成功。
I want some persons more experienced than Tom.     我要一些比汤姆更有经验的人。 Only experienced pilots fly large passenger aircraft.     只有有经验的飞行员才能驾驶大型客机。

column2: n. 实验&试验&尝试 v. 实验&尝试
column3: Some scientists experiment on animals.     有些科学家用动物做试验。 Small businesses are anxious to experiment with computers.     小型企业都急于试用计算机。

column2: a. 实验(性)的&试验(性)的
column3: The technique is still at the experimental stage.     这项技术正处于实验阶段。 In experimental plots the yield has been doubled.     在试验田里&产量已（被）提高了一倍。
The process of conducting such a test; experimentation.     实验过程做这种试验的过程；实验 A room or building equipped for scientific experimentation or research.     实验室用于科学实验或研究的房屋或建筑

column2: a. 熟练的&内行的 n. 专家&能手
column3: According to expert opinions& they gave up the experiment immediately.     根据专家们的意见&他们马上放弃了这项试验。 He is an well-known expert in finance.     他是知名的金融专家。

column2: n. 专家的意见&专门技术
column3: And the scientist in Boston will be able to call on the expertise of the scientist in Shanghai& and all of it in a matter of seconds.     同样&在美国波士顿的一位科学家&也将能够向上海的一位科学家要求提供专门知识。而这种联系只需要几秒钟的时间就可以接通。 But the areas of our mutual cooperation continue to expand. We have already agreed to cooperate more closely in trade& technology& investment& and exchanges of scientific and managerial expertise.     但是我们彼此合作的领域还在不断增加。我们已经商定在贸易、技术、投资以及科学与管理专门知识的交流等方面更密切地合作。
The expiration of contract is coming.     合同快到期了。 When is the expiration of your driving license?     你的驾驶执照何时到期？

column2: v. 期满&失效&终止&断气
column3: My passport is due to expire in two months.     我的护照再过两个月就到期了。 Our current contract is about to expire& and we'll need to discuss a new one.     欧文们现有合同快要期满了&需要再谈一个新合同。
That explains why she is not here.     那就说明了她不在这里的原因。 The lawyer explained the new law to us.     律师向我们解释了新法律。
Did he provide a satisfactory explanation?     他是否给出了令人满意的解释？ What did he say in explanation of his stupid behavior?     他说了什么来解释他那愚蠢的行为？
An explanatory table or list of the symbols appearing on a map or chart.     图例对出现在地图上或图表中的有关符号进行解释的一览表或清单 Serving to explain; explanatory.     作解释用的；说明的

column2: a. 填补的(补足的&附加的&多余的) n. 填补物
column3: He uttered several vigorous expletives when he dropped the iron on his foot.     他的熨斗掉下砸在脚上& 他随口骂了几声. `Damn!' is an expletive.     ｀该死!＇是咒骂语.

column2: a. 明确的&详述的&明晰的&外在的
column3: He gave me explicit directions on how to get there.     他清清楚楚地告诉我怎样到达那里. She was quite explicit about why she left.     她对自己离去的原因直言不讳.

column2: ad. 明白地& 明确地
column3: The definition of a global symbol that is not explicitly available for reference by modules linked with the module in which the definition occurs.     一种全局符号定义&它不能被与定义该全局符号的模块相链接的其它模块直接引用。

column2: v. 爆炸&爆发&激发 [计算机] 爆炸
column3: He exploded with rage.     他勃然大怒&暴跳如雷。 The firework exploded in his hand.     那个爆竹在他手里响了。

column2: n. 功绩&勋绩 v. 开发&利用&开拓
column3: People should read the related regulations before they exploit natural resources.     在开发自然资源前&人们应该先了解相关的规定。 Television advertisers can exploit a captive audience.     电视广告商能利用被动观众.

column2: n. 开发&开采&自私的利用
column3: Generally speaking& mineral exploitation is a feast-or-famine industry.     一般来说&开矿这种事业不是大大成功便是彻底失败。 Exploitation of unwary consumers.     对粗心消费者的不当利用

They decided to make a full exploration of the accident.     他们决定对事故做一次全盘研究。 It is true during their explorations they often faced difficulties and dangers of the most perilous nature.     确实在探险中&他们经常面临着各种最有危险性的艰难和险阻。

Love and hate are extremes.     爱和恨是两个极端。 Extremes are dangerous.     【谚】凡事走向极端是危险的。

Try to discourage such familiarities from your subordinates.     不要让属下对你这样不拘礼仪。 His familiarity with the local languages surprised me.     他对当地语言如此精通令我吃惊。

column2: a. 家庭的 n. 家庭

Of course& these implications would sly and groundless& and the opposition would realize it. But the voters might not. They would say where there's smoke there's fire.     当然这些暗示是狡诈的&毫无根据的&反对派懂得这点。但选民不一定懂得&他们会说无风不起浪。 Facts have proved these worries groundless.     事实证明&这些忧虑是没有根据的。

This district grew cotton on a large scale.     这个地区过去大量种棉花。 In time you'll grow to like him.     到时候你会喜欢他的。

column2: a. 已长成的 n. 成人

Childhood is a period of rapid growth.     幼年是生长迅速的时期。 It is hoped the tax cuts will act as a stimulant to further economic growth.     希望降低税率这一措施能刺激经济进一步增长.

column2: n. 怨恨&恶意 v. 怀恨&嫉妒&吝惜

column2: v.&n. 保证&担保 vt. 保证

The legal guardian must act on behalf of the child.     法定监护人应该维护这个孩子的利益. A guardian; a protector.     监护人；保护人

column2: n. 猜测&推测&猜想 v. 猜测&推测

Under his guidance& we finished the work smoothly.     在他的指导下&我们顺利地完成了工作。 We should not do anything under the guidance of instincts.     我们不应该凭着直觉做事情。

His face showed guilt though he said he had done nothing wrong.     尽管他说自己没做过错事&他的脸上却显出了内疚的神情。 The lawyer shafted the prisoner into an admission of guilt.     这位律师使得这名罪犯承认了自己的罪行。

The shops are quite handy.     商店就在附近。 A few more traveller's cheques may come in handy on the holiday.     多带几张旅行支票&度假时会有用的。

column2: a. 偶然的 ad. 杂乱的(地)&任意的(地)

Happening by a fortunate accident or chance.     幸运地发生的因某种幸运事件或机会而发生的 What's happening?     近来怎么样?

column2: ad. 幸福地&快乐地&幸好

His marriage is full of happiness.     他的婚姻生活很幸福。 Money can't buy happiness.     金钱买不来幸福。
That was not a very happy remark.     那不是很恰当的话。 I wish you a happy birthday.     祝你生日快乐。

column2: v. 使...困扰&使...烦恼&反复袭击

column2: n. 港&避难所 v. 庇护&隐藏&藏匿

column2: a. 硬的 ad. 努力地

column2: n. 大胆(结实&抵抗力&耐寒性)

Many women chose to be a housewife after marriage.     许多妇女选择了在婚后当家庭主妇。 She is a career woman rather than a housewife.     她是职业妇女而不是家庭主妇。
Housework keeps mother on the fly all day.     家务劳动使母亲整天忙忙碌碌。 We alternate in doing the housework.     我们轮流做家务。

column2: a. 人的&人类的 n. 人

People have found many humane methods of killing animals.     人们已经发明了很多宰杀动物的人道方 法。 A humane society always does well by its old people.     一个仁慈的社会对待老人总是很好。

column2: n. 人类 人性;人道;慈爱[U] He treated the prisoners with humanity. 他人道地对待俘虏。 人文学科[the P] She has a background in humanities and modern languages. 她学过人文学科和现代语言。
column3: We should treat people and animals with humanity.     我们应该仁慈地对待人和动物。 Such a man is a stain to humanity.     这种人是人类的耻辱。

It's said by forecast that the humidity in the air today is 60%.     据预报说今天的空气湿度是百分之六十。 Humidity is a measure of moisture in the atmosphere.     湿度是空气内含水分多少的量度.

column2: v. 使...丢脸&使...蒙羞&屈辱

column2: a. 理想的 n. 理想

column2: n. 内部的人&会员&知道内情的人

column3: I've got an insight into the problem.     我对问题豁然开朗。 The book is filled with remarkable insights.     这本书很有真知卓见。

column2: a. 无关紧要的&可忽略的
column3: His hometown is an insignificant city on the map.     他的家乡只是地图上一个不起眼的小城。 It is a waste of time to listen to his insignificant talk.     听他那些废话纯属浪费时间。
Sickening or insipid in taste.     （味道上）令人作呕的&淡而无味的 Insipid; weak; wishy-washy.     无味的；缺乏生气的；软弱无力的
He insisted on paying for the meal.     他坚持要付饭钱。 Since you insist& I must amend the letter of credit.     既然你坚持&我就只好修改信用证。
She's a most insistent person; she won't take `no' for an answer.     她是个说一不二的人& 决不容别人反对. You mustn't be late; he was most insistent about that.     你万不可迟到& 他对这一点最严格.
I'll help you insofar as I can.     我将尽力帮助你。 "Insofar as I can see& the representatives are all satisfied with the arrangement."     ＂据我了解&代表们对这一安排都感到满意。＂
His staff is insolent to our manager.     他的员工对我们的经理很无礼。 You insolent young puppy!     你这个目中无人的小子!

column2: a. 无力偿还的&破产的 n. 无力还偿者&破产者
column3: A debtor that& upon voluntary petition or one invoked by the debtor's creditors& is judged legally insolvent. The debtor's remaining property is then administered for the creditors or is distributed among them.     破产者经自愿请求或被债务人的债权人所请求&在法律上被判定为无偿债能力的债务人。该债务人的剩余财产交由债权人管理或在债权人之间分配 A priority of payment given to one or more creditors by an insolvent debtor.     优先偿付由破产负债人给予一个或多个债权人的优先偿付

column2: v. 检查&调查&监查&检阅
column3: It was strange that nobody inspected my ticket before I got on the train.     很奇怪&我上火车前&竟然没有人查看我的车票。 Police were called out to keep at the airport& and inspect the arriving planes.     警察们被紧急召集起来去守卫机场&并对到达的飞机进行检查。
The soldiers lined up for their daily inspection by their officers.     士兵们列队接受长官的日常检阅。 I gave the radio a thorough inspection before buying it.     我把收音机彻底检查了一遍才买了下来。
A ticket inspector got on the train.     查票员上了火车。 We had sundry visitations from the Tax Inspector.     税务检查员常来我们这里& 不胜其烦.
His wife was a constant inspiration to him.     他的妻子经常鼓励他。 Many poets and artists have drawn their inspiration from nature.     许多诗人和艺术家从大自然中获得他们的灵感。
His best music was inspired by the memory of his mother.     他最好的乐曲创作灵感来自怀念他的母亲。 The sight inspired him with nostalgia.     这景象激起了他的怀旧之情。

column2: a. 有创见的&有灵感的
column3: His best music was inspired by the memory of his mother.     他最好的乐曲创作灵感来自怀念他的母亲。 Never before have they been so inspired and so daring as at present.     从来没有看见他们像现在这样精神振奋&意气风发。
He possesses the quality of inspiring confidence.     他有本事能让别人信任他. The inspiring music acted on the emotions of the students.     那激昂的音乐使学生们情绪激昂。

column2: n. 不安定&不稳定&基础薄弱
column3: Insecurity or instability.     不安全或不稳定 The riot can be considered a symptom of political instability.     这次暴动可看作是政治上不稳定的征兆。

The salesman said it would make all the difference to our heating bills if we installed double glazing.     那推销员说&如果我们安装双层玻璃窗的话&我们的暖气帐单就会完全不一样了。 A tub for bathing& especially one installed in a bathroom.     浴缸澡盆&尤指固定设置在浴室内

column2: n. 分期付款(安装&一期)

column2: n. 例子 v. 举...为例&举例说明
column3: This is only one instance out of many.     这不过是许多例子中的一个。 He came at our instance.     他应我们的请求而来。

column2: n. 立即&瞬间 a. 立即的&即时的
column3: I'll be back in an instant.     我马上就回来。 I took an instant dislike to him.     我一见他就不喜欢。

column2: a. 瞬间的&即刻的 ad. 瞬间&霎时
column3: Relief was instantaneous.     痛苦的消除是瞬间的事 Death is instantaneous in a fatal accident.     在致命的事故中&死亡是即刻发生的。
Please tell me instantly he arrives.     他一到就请告诉我。 It's an instantly recognizable face.     那是我一眼就能认得出的面孔。
I gave him advice instead of money.     我给了他忠告&而不是钱。 I made this cake specially& with brown sugar instead of white.     我特别地以红糖代替白糖做了这个蛋糕。

column2: a. 充满的 n. 本能&天性&直觉
column3: Birds learn to fly by instinct.     鸟类学习飞翔是出于本能。 Instinct is not always a good guide.     凭本能行事不一定都对.
Running away is our instinctive reaction when we meet danger.     遇到危险时&我们的本能反应就是跑开。 Set aside for a moment your instinctive dislike of the man.     暂且不要考虑你从直觉上憎恶他这一因素.

column2: n. 学会&学院&协会 v. 创立&开始&制定
column3: He graduated from a famous foreign language institute.     他毕业于一所知名的外语学院。 The police instituted an inquiry into the cause of the accident.     警方开始调查事故的原因。
Marriage is an institution in most societies.     婚姻是大多数社会早已确立的制度。 A trustee is a member of managing business affairs of an institution.     理事是机构管理班子中的成员。

column2: v. 教&命令&指导 [计算机] 指示
column3: His uncle instructed him in French.     他的叔叔教他法语。 I have been instructed by my agent that you still owe me 100 pounds.     我的代理人通知我&你还欠我100磅。

column2: n. 说明&须知&指令&教学
column3: The teacher gave them instructions to arrive early tomorrow morning.     老师命令他们明天早晨要早到。 The catechism is used for religious instruction.     教义问答法常用于宗教教学。
This is an instructive book.     这是本有教育意义的书。 The minister's visit to the prison was not instructive.     牧师这次探监没有意义。
Our driving instructor is very kind.     我们的驾驶教练非常和善。 Our instructor told us to keep the room locked.     我们的教导员告诉我们把那间房锁上。

column2: n. 乐器&工具&仪器&器械
column3: The hospital imported some surgical instruments.     医院进口了一些外科器械。 The organization he had built up eventually became the instrument of his downfall.     他创建起来的组织到头来却成为促使他倒台的根本原因了。

column2: a. 仪器的&器具的&可做为手段的

The instrumentation is particularly fine.     这首器乐曲编得特别细致.

A bank check drawn on insufficient funds to take advantage of the time interval required for collection.     通融票据利用筹款需要的时间间隔开出不足的资金的银行支票 His children were dwarfed by insufficient food.     他的儿女因营养不良而发育不全。

column2: v. 使...绝缘&隔离 [计算机] 绝缘

Loss of electric current as a result of faulty insulation.     漏电由于绝缘不好而导致的电流流失 Cork is often used for insulation.     栓皮经常用作绝缘材料.
Conductors let electricity through& but insulators don't let through.     导体让电流通过&而绝缘体则不让通过。

Canadian physiologist. He shared a1923 Nobel Prize for the discovery of insulin.     班廷&弗雷德里克·格朗1891－1941加拿大生理学家。因发现了胰岛素而获1923年诺贝尔奖 American-born Canadian physiologist noted for his work on the discovery and application of insulin.     贝斯特&查尔斯·赫伯特1899－1978美裔加拿大生理学家&因其对胰岛素的发现与应用方面的工作而著名
He shouted insults at the boy who had kicked him.     他大声辱骂那个踢了他的男孩。 He felt deeply insulted.     他觉得受了大辱。
He pays out 100 dollars in insurance premiums every year.     他每年付保险费一百美元。 The accident prompted her to renew her insurance.     这一事故促使她为投保续期.
My house is insured against fire.     我的房子保了火险。 I am insured for all risks.     我给自己保了综合险。

column2: a. 尚未被人碰过的&原封不动的&完整的
column3: Few buildings survived the bombing raids intact.     空袭过後幸存的建筑物绝无仅有。 His honor remained intact.     他的名誉完整无损。

column2: a. 难以明了的&无形的
column3: Sound and light are intangible.     声和光是触摸不到的。 It is an intangible asset& and so be not show as an asset in a company's account& unless it figured as part of the purchase price paid when acquiring another company.     商誉是一种无形资产&因为它不作为资产显示在公司的帐目中&除非收购另一公司时将它作为所付购买价格的一部分用数字来表示。

a. 整合的 v. 整合 vbl. 整合

The policy of making only a perfunctory effort or symbolic gesture toward the accomplishment of a goal& such as racial integration.     表面文章一种只对一个要完成的目标、如种族融合而作一些随意的努力或象征性的姿态的策略 A plan for the solution of a problem; consists of planning and coding& numerical analysis& systems analysis& specification of printing formats& and any other functions necessary to the integration of a computer in a system.     为解决某一问题而作出的计划&包括规划和编码、数值分析、系统分析、打印格式规定以及把计算机结合进一个系统所必需的其它功能。

column2: n. 诚实&正直&完整&完善
column3: You can trust him; he is a man of complete integrity.     你可以相信他&他是一个刚正不阿的人。 Our integrity as a nation is threatened by these separatist forces.     我们国家的完整受到了这些分裂主义势力的威胁。

column2: n. 有知识者&知识份子&凭理智做事者 a. 智力的&知性的&聪明的

column2: n. 理解力&智力 n. 情报&情报工作&情报机关
column3: His intelligence quotient is very high.     他的智商很高。 You should use your intelligence.     你应该发挥你的聪明才智。
The student gave an intelligent answer.     这个学生给出了一个聪明的回答。 Someone as intelligent as you should go far.     像你这样聪明的人一定很有作为。

column2: a. 可理解的&易理解的&明了的
column3: His theory is not intelligible to us.     他的理论我们无法理解。 Readily comprehended or understood; intelligible.     易懂的易于理解或明白的；易懂的

column2: v. 打算 vt. 想要&打算&计划
column3: I intended to catch the early train& but I didn't get up in time.     我本来打算赶早班的火车&但是我起晚了。 That remark was intended as a joke.     那句话本来只是个玩笑。

column2: a. 非常的&强烈的&紧张的&热情的

column2: vt. 增强(强化&加剧&加厚&增高银影密度)

column2: n. 激烈&强度&强烈&剧烈

column2: a. 集中的&强化的&精细的&深入的
column3: Intensive efforts are being made to resolve the dispute.     现正全力以赴来解决这场纠纷。 This patient requires intensive care.     该病人需要加强护理。

column2: n. 意图&目的&意向 a. 专心的&决心的&热心的
column3: She behaved foolishly but with good intent.     她的行为很蠢&但却是好意的。 Your intent gaze made her uncomfortable.     你的注目凝视使她感到不自在。
They have no intention of getting married at present.     他们目前没有结婚的打算。 Have you heard of her intention to resign?     你听到她打算辞职的传闻了吗？

column2: a. 企图的&策划的&故意的

column2: v. 相互作用&相互影响

column2: n. 相互作用&相互影响
column3: There should be a lot more interaction between the social services and local doctors.     社会公益服务机构和当地医生应该加强协作。 The dynamics of bodies moving relative to gases& especially the interaction of moving objects with the atmosphere.     空气动力学相对于气体的物体移动&特别是移动物体与大气相互作用的动力学
Our English software is an interactive educational software.     我们的英语软件是一种交互式教育软件。 But its truly revolutionary character can be seen in its interactive potential.     但它真正革命的特性能够在其相互影响的潜力方面表现出来。

column2: n. 截取&妨碍&截距 v. 拦截&阻止&截取 [计算机] 截断
column3: Reporters intercepted him as he tried to leave by the rear entrance.     他想从后门溜走&记者把他截住了。 The police had been intercepting my mails.     警方一直截查我的邮件。
The police had been intercepting my mails.     警方一直截查我的邮件。 Effective defence is a matter of intercepting their missiles before they can reach us.     有效的防卫是不待对方导弹击中我们而先行将其拦截.

column2: n. 立体交叉道&互换 v. 交换&互换 [计算机] 互换
column3: We should leave the motorway at the next interchange.     我们应该在下一个立体交叉道驶离高速公路。 The chief interchanged the diamond with some pieces of glass.     那首领拿一些玻璃块替换了那些钻石。
It's strange how people's lives interconnect.     人们的生活是如何互相联系在一起的& 真是不可思议. A series of interconnected points.     一系列相互连接的点。

column2: n. 相互连接&彼此连系
n. 交往&交流&中断期间
column3: English is more widespread and more used in international intercourse than German.     英语在国际交往中比德语使用得更为广泛。 A friendly intercourse has been opened between the two countries.     两国已开始了亲密的往来。

column2: n. 兴趣&嗜好&利息 v. 使...感兴趣
column3: His two great interests in life are music and painting.     音乐和绘画是他生活中的两大嗜好。 Politics has always interested me.     我一直对政治学有兴趣。

I tried to tell him about it& but he just wasn't interested.     我想把这件事告诉他&可他简直不感兴趣。 Lots of times you have to pretend to join a parade in which you're not really interested in order to get where you're going.     好多时候&为了要走到你想到的地点&你得假装成参加那一队你实在不感兴趣的行列走。
This book is interesting.     这本书很有趣。 I think these interesting old customs should be preserved.     我认为这些有趣的旧习俗应该保存下去。

column2: n. 界面&接触面 [计算机] 界面&接口

I'll go tomorrow if nothing interferes.     如果没有其他的事&我明天去。 Don't interfere with my business.     不要干涉我的事情。

column2: n. 冲突&干涉 [计算机] 于涉

column2: a. 中间的&暂时的&临时的 n. 中间时期&过渡时期&暂定

column2: a. 内部的&内地的&国内的&在内的 n. 内部

Our feelings are interlinked.     我们的感情是相通的。

A fastening device consisting of parallel rows of metal& plastic& or nylon teeth on adjacent edges of an opening that are interlocked by a sliding tab.     拉链由平行的金属、塑料或尼龙的齿状物制成的&在开口临近边缘上被滑动的拉环锁住的紧扣物 An interlocking or entanglement of elements or parts.     连接各因素或部分的连接或纠结

column2: a. 间歇的&断断续续的

column3: A belligerent person or a militant partisan.     交战的人或好战的游击队队员 One that believes in or follows the ideas of Marx and Engels& especially a militant Communist.     马克思主义者马克思和恩格斯主义信仰者或追随者&尤指富于战斗精神的共产党员

column2: a. 军事的 n. 军队
column3: In some countries all the young men do a year's military service.     有些国家&所有年轻男子都要服一年兵役。 Military history is really outside my domain.     我对军队史实在一窍不通。

column2: n. 义勇军&自卫队&国民军
column3: People gathered to form a militia to protect their town.     人们聚集起来&组成国民自卫队来保卫他们的城镇。 Only the president or a state govern or could call out the military or state militia.     只有总统或州长才能紧急召集军队或州人民自卫队。

column2: n. 奶&乳状物 v. 挤乳&产乳
column3: Would you like a glass of milk?     想喝杯牛奶吗？ The farmer whistled as he milked.     农夫一边挤奶一边吹口哨。
She was hired as a milkmaid in that farm.     她被雇佣为那个农场的挤奶女工。 All the cows died in the fire because they were barred in by the milkmaids.     由于被挤奶女工关了起来&奶牛在这次火灾中全被烧死了。
The dog snarled at the milkman.     那条狗对著送牛奶的人低声吠叫. She went off with the milkman.     她与送牛奶的人私奔了.

column2: a. 乳状的&乳白色的&柔和的
column3: I like my coffee milky.     我喜欢喝有牛奶的咖啡。 There may be millions of worlds in the Milky Way Galaxy.     银河系中也许有几百万个世界。

column2: n. 磨粉机&磨坊&制造厂 v. 磨细&乱转&打
column3: He used a miller to mill the grain into flour.     他用碾磨机把谷物磨成面粉。 The logs are drifted downstream to the mill.     那些原木沿河顺水漂到工厂.
The town miller was famous for his excellent flour.     镇上的面粉场主以优质面粉著称。 He used a miller to mill the grain into flour.     他用碾磨机把谷物磨成面粉。

A unit of retinal illumination& equal to the amount of light that reaches the retina through 1 square millimeter of pupil area from a surface having a brightness of 1 candela per square meter.     光度视网膜亮度单位&相当于每平方米有一烛光亮度的表面&通过一平方毫米的瞳孔区域&到达视网膜的光线数量 The edge must be machined to 0.02 millimeters.     这边缘必须切割到0.02毫米的精密度。

column2: n. 百万 a. 百万
column3: There were millions of people in the square.     广场上有好多好多人。 The record was a big hit and sold a million copies.     这张唱片非常成功&卖了一百万张。

column2: n. 百万富翁 v. 沉淀&存款&定金
column3: The lazy girl is dreaming of marrying a millionaire and therefore won't do any work.     这个懒惰的女孩正梦想着嫁给一个有钱人& 从此不再工作。 The library's latest acquisitions were donated by a millionaire.     图书馆最近增添的书籍是一位百万富翁捐献的。

column2: a. 模仿的&假的 [计算机] 模拟的 v. 模仿
column3: This parrot is an amazing mimic.     这只鹦鹉很会学舌。 He mimicked his uncle's voice and gestures perfectly.     他把叔叔的声音和姿态模仿得惟妙惟肖。

column2: n. 切碎物 v. 切碎&矫揉做作地说
column3: I minced the lean meat finely before making dumplings.     包饺子前&我把瘦肉细细剁碎。 I won't mince words (with you): I think your plan is stupid.     我不（跟你）兜圈子& 我认为你的计画是胡闹.

column2: n. 思想&主意&心意 v. 介意&照顾&留心
column3: Would you mind if I smoke here?     我在这吸烟&你介意吗？ Mind your head!     小心别碰了头!

column2: a. 有意的&有心的&具有意志的
column3: He could do it if he were so minded.     假如他想做&他就能做。 She has become very food-minded since her holiday in France.     她自法国度假回来& 对食物就很讲究了.

column2: a. 深切注意的&留神的&留心的
column3: Mindful of the need to maintain efficient communication& the board of directors decided to construct a new communication network.     董事会注意到维持有效通讯的需要&因此决定建立一个新的通信网。 Be mindful to follow my advice.     你要注意照我的忠告去做。

column2: a. 不小心的&不留神的&不顾虑的
n. 意向&精神状态 心态
n. 地雷&矿&矿山 pron. 我的 v. 采掘&开矿
column3: That book is mine.     那本书是我的。 The cruiser was mined& and sank in five minutes.     这艘巡洋舰触雷&五分钟后沉没了。
International law is a minefield for anyone not familiar with its complexity.     国际法这一领域& 不熟悉其复杂性则寸步难行.
I think it is dangerous to be a miner.     我认为当矿工是很危险的。 The boarding-house keeper drew his pistol upon the miner who owed him& and said&"Down with the dust! "     寄宿公寓的管理员拔出手枪对欠他房租的矿工说&“把钱交出来！”

column2: a. 矿物的 n. 矿物&矿石
column3: Coal is a mineral.     煤是一种矿物。 This shop sells minerals.     这家商店卖矿泉水。

They have sold up ten crates of mineral water in the afternoon.     他们这个下午卖掉了十箱矿泉水。 Can I have a carafe of water& please? Mineral water& sir? No& ordinary tap water will do.     请给我拿瓶水来&好吗？是矿泉水吗&先生？不&普通自来水就行。

A Chinese dynasty(1271-1368) established by the Mongolian ruler Kublai Khan at Peking(Beijing). It was superseded by the Ming dynasty.     元朝由蒙古统治者忽必烈汗在北京建立的一个中国王朝（1271-1368年）&它被明朝取代 The pagoda built in the Ming Dynasty is still in good repair.     建于明代的那座塔现在还完好无损。
She accepted the money with mingled feelings.     她悲喜交集地收下了这笔钱。 He mingled in the crowd and lost in sight.     他混入人群&看不见了。
This restaurant serves very mingy portions.     这家餐厅的饮食分量很少. He's so mingy with his money.     他对钱十分吝啬.

column2: n. 缩型(缩影&小型计算机)
column3: The basic design of the Mini has held good for more than twenty-five years.     微型汽车的基本设计已经适用了25年以上。

column2: n. 缩图&小画像 a. 小规模的&纤小的
column3: He showed me the miniature of the mansion.     他给我显示了大厦的模型。 She is just like her mother in miniature.     她简直是她母亲的缩影。

The two-year-old boy liked a lot the boy minibus while her mother bought him for the first time. He always slept with it.     这两岁的小男孩子非常喜爱他母亲第一次给他买的微型玩具车&他睡觉时也总是拿着睡。 I am told this minibus can go jar on very little petrol.     我听说这种小客车能靠很少汽油开很多路。

The system on the small-scale is called a microcomputer or minicomputer.     小规模的系统叫做微型计算机或小型计算机。 A computer larger than a minicomputer that can handle more users and large programs.     一种比小型计算机大&能容纳更多用户和处理较大程序的计算机。

column2: a. 最低限度的&最小的
column3: We stayed with friends& so our expenses were minimal.     我们住在朋友家& 所以我们的花费很小. Singapore& the world the minimal and one of the most advanced nation& celebrated the nation independent of30 anniversaries in last week.     新加坡&这个世界上最小也是最发达的国家之一&上周庆祝国家独立三十周年。

column2: v. 将...减到最少 [计算机] 最小化
column3: To minimize the risk of burglary& install a good alarm system.     安装可靠的报警设备以减低被盗的风险. He minimized the value of her contribution to his research so that he got all the praise.     他极力贬低她在那项研究中的贡献& 从而独获全部奖励.

column2: a. 最低的&最小的 n. 最小量&最低限度
column3: Repairing your car will cost a minimum of 100 dollars.     修理你的汽车最低限度要100美元。 The class needs a minimum of 6 pupils to continue.     这个班最低限度要六个学生才可以继续办下去。
This area depends on the mining industry.     这个地区以采矿业为经济基础. He went heels over head into buying mining stock.     他购买了矿业股票&做事真鲁莽。
They are the dictator and his minions.     他们就是那个独裁者和他的奴仆。 Can you send one of your minions to collect this file?     你能不能派个助手来取这份档案？
It's an era of the miniskirt in the seventies.     七十年代是超短裙时代。 Miniskirts are starting to come back.     超短裙又开始流行了。

column2: n. 部长&大臣 v. 伺候 vi. 照顾&给予帮助
column3: He was elected Minister of Education.     他被选为教育部长。 The Chancellor of the Exchequer is the minister in charge of finance in Britain.     英国财政大臣是负责财政的大臣。

column2: a. 部长的&内阁的&执政的
column3: They carried the ministerial veto.     他们行使了内阁否决权。
The army& navy and airforce are all controlled by the Ministry of Defense.     陆海空军皆由国防部控制。 She's on attachment to the Ministry of Defense.     她现在隶属于国防部。
Picked up a mink coat on sale.     拍卖时随手买了一件貂皮大衣 She wheedled him into buying her a mink coat.     她用甜言蜜语诱他买貂皮大衣给她。
These criminals arrested by the police are only minnows& their leader has escaped.     这些被警察抓住的犯罪分子只是些小鱼&他们的头子却跑掉了。

column2: n. 未成年人&副修科目 a. 次要的&较小的&二流的&未成年的 v. 辅修 [音乐] 小调
column3: She acted as a minor role in the play.     她在剧中扮演了一个次要的角色。 I made minor alterations to the article.     我对这篇文章作了小规模的修改。
A small minority voted against the motion.     投票反对该提议的人占少数。 There are 55 minorities in our country.     我国有55个少数民族。
The minstrel travelled about the country singing songs and poems written by him.     这名吟游诗人在全国游历&吟唱他自己写的诗歌。 The minstrel has been to many places before he came here.     在来到这里之前&这个吟游诗人已经去过很多地方。

column2: n. 薄荷&造币厂&巨额 v. 铸造&铸币&伪造
column3: The poet minted several words that cannot be found in any dictionary.     诗人造了几个词典里找不到的词。 Many people like to chew mint gum in the summer.     许多人喜欢在夏天嚼薄荷口香糖。
A French peasant dance resembling the minuet.     加伏特舞一种法国农民的舞蹈&类似于小步舞 The music for or in the rhythm of the minuet.     米奴哀舞曲为米奴哀舞而写的舞曲或米奴哀舞节奏的舞蹈

column2: a. 负的&减去的 n. 减号&负号 prep. 减去
column3: I got B minus in the test.     我在考试中得了个B-。 Seven minus three equals four.     七减三等于四。

column2: n. 草写小字&小写字 a. 草写小字的&小写字的
a. 微小的 n. 分钟
column3: I had remembered in minute detail everything that had happened.     我对发生的每件事的细枝末节都记得清清楚楚。 The park is only five minutes from downtown.     这个花园离市中心只有五分钟的路程。
The minutes of the last meeting were approved.     上次会议记录已获得通过. Boil the vegetables for 20 minutes and then drain off the water.     把蔬菜煮上20分钟&然后把水沥掉。
Her life was saved by a miracle.     她的生命是靠奇迹救活的。 This cathedral was regarded as a miracle in architectural history.     这座大教堂被认为是建筑史上的奇迹。

column2: a. 奇迹的&不可思议的
column3: It's miraculous how much weight you've lost!     你体重减轻了这么多&真了不起！ The relics are credited with miraculous powers.     这些早期遗物被认为具有神奇的力量.
A mirage is an optical illusion.     海市蜃楼是一种视错觉. The heat reflected from the white sand formed a mirage.     热气经白色的沙面反射形成了蜃景.

column2: n. 泥沼&泥泞 v. 使...陷于泥泞&使...陷入困境
column3: The most brilliant person may be mired in detail and confusion.     即使是最聪明的人也会陷入琐事与混乱之中。 My car was mired.     我的车上溅满污泥。

column2: n. 镜子 v. 反映&反射
column3: She stared at herself in the mirror.     她凝视着镜中的自己。 The clear water mirrored the blue sky.     清澈的水中映出蔚蓝的天空。
His figure looks very funny in the concave mirror.     他的样子在凹镜里显得非常可笑。 The mirror is oval.     镜子是椭圆的。
Christmas is a time of mirth& especially for children.     圣诞节是个快乐的日子&尤其是对孩子们。 When I told them what had happened to me& they all chortled with mirth.     我把我的事告诉他们以後& 他们咯咯地笑起来了.
Their holiday was ruined by a whole series of misadventures.     一连串的不幸事故把他们的假日全毁了. The court returned a verdict of death by misadventure.     法院裁定意外致死或意外事故死亡。

column2: n. 厌恶人类的人&不愿与人来往者

column3: I thought you wanted to see me but I was clearly under a complete misapprehension.     我以为你想见我& 显然完全是我误解了.
The treasurer misappropriated the society's funds.     那会计盗用了协会的基金. "He did misappropriate the public funds& but there were extenuating circumstances."     ＂他的确挪用了公款&但有可以减轻罪责的情况。＂

column2: v. 行为无礼貌&行为不端&作弊

column3: By a miscarriage of justice the wrong man was condemned.     由于法庭的错误判决&一个无辜的人被定了罪。 Sending an innocent man to prison is a clear miscarriage of justice.     把无辜的人投入监狱显然是审判不公.

column2: vt. 流产(失败&产生错误)
column3: The parcel must have miscarry& for she never receive it.     邮包一定投递错了&因为她一直没有收到。

column2: a. 各种的&多方面的 [计算机] 杂的 n. [合同法律用语]其他约定
column3: He likes to have miscellaneous collection.     他喜欢多种多样的收集。 The miscellaneous expenses of import are so much!     进口货物的杂费太多了！
The show was a miscellany of song and dance.     那场演出是又有歌曲又有舞蹈的混合表演.
I lost your file by pure mischance.     我把你的文件丢了&纯粹是碰上倒霉事了。 A series of mischance happened.     一连串不幸的事发生了。
The wind played mischief with my papers.     风把我的文章吹得乱七八糟。 I try to keep the boy out of mischief.     我尽量不让这个男孩胡闹。
One expects active children to be mischievous at times.     活泼的孩子有时是会淘气的。 Mischievous& teasing& or annoying.     有害的、调皮的或打搅
The housing needs of our inner cities have been misconceived from the start.     我们旧城区的住房需求一开始就受到误解.
That a doctor shall be able to physic any disease is a misconception.     认为医生应该能医治任何疾病的观念是错误的。

column2: n. 处理不当(胡作非为) vt 处理不当(胡作非为)
column3: That doctor has been accused of professional misconduct.     那位医生被指控违反医德。 The company only dismisses its employees in cases of gross misconduct.     公司仅在雇员严重失职的情形下才予以解雇.
You have completely misconstrued me/my words/what I said.     你完全误解了我[我的话/我的意思]了.

column2: a. 极恶的&协道的&异端的 n. 罪大恶极的人&恶棍&异端

column3: The miser was despised by everyone in the city.     这个守财奴受到城市里每个人的鄙视。 `A generous miser' is a contradiction in terms.     ｀慷慨的吝啬鬼＇在用词上自相矛盾.
The play was a miserable failure.     这出戏演砸了。 There are still many people whose living conditions are miserable.     仍有许多人的生活条件是很艰苦的。
She failed miserably.     她失败得很惨。 Suffering from poverty; miserably poor.     贫困的穷困潦倒的；悲惨的
I am ill with misery.     我病得难受。 Virtue and vice are two different things: the former/that/the one leads to peace& the latter/this/the other to misery.     美德与邪恶是不同的&前者带来和平&后者导致痛苦。
The engine is misfiring badly on one cylinder.     发动机有一个汽缸严重失灵. The joke misfired completely.     这个笑话讲得完全不成功.

column2: n. 不能适应社会或工作环境的人
column3: He always feel a bit of a misfit in the business world.     他总觉得自己在商业界有些不适应。 The argument misfits the case.     这论椐不适用于这一事件。
He had the misfortune to fall ill on the day of the examination.     他很倒霉&在考试当天生病了。 One misfortune followed another.     不幸的事情一件接著一件.

column2: v. 怀疑&恐惧 vt. 使担心

column3: His heart is full of misgivings.     他心中疑虑重重。 I have many misgivings about taking the job.     我对是否接受那项工作顾虑重重。
His heart is full of misgivings.     他心中疑虑重重。 I have many misgivings about taking the job.     我对是否接受那项工作顾虑重重。

column2: v. 给予错误的消息或指导&使误入歧途

column3: The thief made a misguided attempt to rob a policewoman.     那个贼不识好歹竟要抢劫一个女警察。 I was misguided into trusting him.     我得到错误印象而信任了他。

column2: n. 不幸之事&灾祸&恶运
column3: Tell your mother you have arrived here without mishap.     告诉你母亲你已经平平安安到达这里。 He hurt his knee during the football match& but this mishap didn't stop him from playing.     足球比赛时他伤了膝盖&可他并没有因此中途退出。
I regret to say you have been misinformed (about that).     很遗憾& （关於那事）你听到的情况不确.
I feel I must qualify my earlier remarks in case they are misinterpret.     我觉得我得把我说的话改得具体些&以免产生误解。 The rioter misinterpret the instructions of the police.     暴徒们错误地解释了警察的指示。
I'm sorry I misjudged you/your motives.     对不起& 我误会你[你的动机]了. I misjudged how wide the stream was and fell in.     我对小河的宽度估计错误& 结果掉进河里了.

column2: n. 估计错误&判断不公
v. 遗失...&把...放错地方 vt. 放错位置&遗失
column3: I seem to have mislaid my passport have you seen it?     我好像把护照放在什麽地方找不到了--你看见了吗? I have mislaid my key to the door.     我不知道把门钥匙放到哪里了。
He misled me into thinking he was rich.     他使我误以为他很有钱。 We were misled by the guide.     向导给我们引错了路。
The misleading sign led me astray.     那个标志误人&它使我迷了路。 Don't judge by appearances appearances can be misleading.     勿以外貌取人--外貌不可靠.

column2: n. 管理不善&处理不当
column3: And who brought us to such a pass? You did& by sheer mismanagement.     谁使我们陷入这样的困境？就是你&纯粹由于你管理不善。 By sheer mismanagement you brought us to such a pass.     完全是你处理不当&才把事情弄得这样糟。
Their marriage was a mismatch they had little in common.     他们的婚姻不般配--两人几无共同之处.
`First-class hotel' was a complete misnomer for the tumbledown farmhouse we stayed in.     把我们住的那个摇摇欲坠的村舍称作｀一流旅馆＇& 纯粹是乱用词语.
I've misplaced my glasses they're not in my bag.     我把眼镜放错地方了--没在我的包里. If you think deafness is funny& you've got a very misplaced sense of humour.     假若认为耳聋有趣& 这种幽默感十分不当.

column2: vt. 误称(把...颠倒黑白&错误表现)
column3: The charge is that the producers of the programme either deliberately misrepresented its nature& or foolishly slid into changing its purpose during production--or both. Of course& it is a matter of judgement whether the charge is made to stick.     指控说这个节目的制作者们要么有意地歪曲了节目的性质&要么就是在制作过程中愚蠢地改变了节目的目的——或者两种情况都有。当然&指控是否成立&还要看法官的裁决。

column2: n. 小姐 vt. 想念 vt. 漏掉&错过
column3: That was a lucky miss.     幸免于难。 May I help you& miss?     要我帮忙吗&小姐？

column2: a. 造型不佳的&残缺的&畸形的
column3: Distorted in form; misshapen.     变形的形状上被扭曲的；畸形的
The huge ship was sunk by a homing missile.     这只巨大的军舰被一枚自动寻的导弹击中。 Demonstrators attacked the police& using sticks and assorted missiles.     示威者用棍棒和各种投掷物攻击警察。
The child had been missing for a week.     那个孩子已经下落不明一个星期了。 The book had two pages missing.     那本书缺两页。

column2: n. 任务&代表团&使命 [计算机] 使命

Any of numerous natural and synthetic compounds of usually high molecular weight consisting of up to millions of repeated linked units& each a relatively light and simple molecule.     聚合物许多天然和人工合成的化合物中的任一种&通常具高分子的重量&包含最多可达上百万个的彼此重复且相连的单位&每一个单位都是一个相对较轻和较简单的分子 Having an open-chain molecular structure rather than a ring-shaped structure.     无环的具有开链分子结构的&而非环状结构的

Not having proper navigational aids the pilot had been unaware of the changing conditions and had flown the plane right into the eye of the tropical storm.     由于没有适当的导航援助&飞行员不了解周围气候的变化情况&将飞机直接飞入了热带飓风眼内。

You can see nebulae in the clear summer sky.     在晴朗的夏夜可以看到天上的星云。

Give us the luxuries of life and we will dispense with necessaries.     请赐给我们以人生的奢侈品吧&我们将会扔掉一切必需品的。 Our income allows only the necessaries of life.     我们的收入只能购买最起码的生活必需品。
Necessarily or demonstrably true; incontrovertible.     必然真实的&可明确论证的；无可置疑的 The constitution of a primitive society is not necessarily simple.     原始社会的结构并不一定就是简单的。

column2: a. 必需的&必要的 n. [pl.]必需品
column3: Is it necessary for me to attend the meeting?     我真的必须参加这个会议吗？ The necessary outcome of a war is a fall in production.     战争带来的必然结果就是生产力下降。

column2: v. 迫使&使...成为必需&需要

The doctor asked us to call him during the night except in case of necessity.     医生吩咐我们&除非必须&否则不要在夜里叫他。 Necessity is the mother of invention.     需要是发明之母。
The fans of the actress craned their necks to catch a glimpse of their idol.     那位女演员的崇拜者们伸长了脖子想看一看他们崇拜的偶像。 The two of them were necking on a park bench.     他们俩在公园的长凳上拥抱亲吻。

Russia and the United States are neck and neck in the race to send a manned spacecraft to Mars.     苏联和美国在发射载人宇宙飞船去火星的研制方面&可以说是并驾齐驱&不相上下。 The two contestants are neck and neck with 20 points each.     比赛双方各得20分& 打成平局.

Any of several small& often brilliantly colored Australasian parrots that feed primarily on soft fruits or the nectar and pollen of flowers and blooming trees.     短尾鹦鹉一种澳大拉西亚的体小、通常色彩鲜艳的鹦鹉&主要食软果或水果原汁花与开花树木和花的蜜

Any of various elongated cells or threadlike structures& especially a muscle fiber or a nerve fiber.     神经纤维尤指肌纤维或神经纤维等各种长形细胞或线状组织中的任一种 The sheath of connective tissue enclosing a bundle of nerve fibers.     经来膜包裹住神经纤维的膜状结缔组织

The heart is a vital organ.     心脏是维持生命必须的器官。 Parliament is an organ of government.     议会是政府的一个机构。

column2: a. 器官的&有机的&根本的&接近自然的
column3: I am not good at organic chemistry.     我的有机化学学得不好。 The music is organic to the story.     这首乐曲是这个故事必不可少的组成部分。
Germs may invade the organism.     细菌会侵入有机体。 The army is an extremely complex organism.     军队是极其复杂的组织。
The organization of such a large-scale party takes a lot of time and energy.     组织这样大规模的聚会要花费许多时间和精力。 They have established a student organization.     他们建立了一个学生组织。

column2: vi. 组织起来 vt. 组织
column3: The meeting was badly organized.     会议组织得很糟。 "Don't mourn for me. Organize! " These were his last words.     "不要为我悲痛&组织起来！"这就是他最后的遗言。

column2: a. [诗]东方的 n. 东方&亚洲
column3: In the market& I breathed the smells of the Orient.     在集市上&我闻到了东方的气息。 Ian is a dab hand at the orient art.     伊恩是东方艺术的行家。
This oriental legend is fascinating.     这个东方传说很吸引人。 China is an oriental country with a long history.     中国是一个有着悠久历史的东方国家。

column2: vt. 定向(确定地址&使...向东&查明真相)

column2: n. 定位&适应&情况介绍 [计算机] 定向

In this way& the object is given both data properties and behaviors& and so object oriented programs can better reflect the real world they are trying to simulate.     通过这种方式&对象被赋予数据特征和行为&因此&使用面向对象程序能够更好地反映程序欲模拟的现实世界。 In the market& I breathed the smells of the Orient.     在集市上&我闻到了东方的气息。
He is a Dane by origin.     他原籍丹麦。 The illness is organic in origin.     该病起初是器质性疾患.

column2: a. 最初的&原始的&有独创性的&原版的 n. 起源&原件&原稿
column3: The original owner of the house moved out.     房子原先的主人搬出去了。 The original picture is in the British Museum.     这幅画的原作在大英博物馆内。
The work lacks originality.     那作品缺乏创造性。 Her designs have great originality.     她的设计十分新颖。

column2: ad. 本来&原来&最初 重要的
column3: The idea originally emanated from his brother.     这个主意最初是他哥哥出的. He originally need not buy such big house.     他本来不必买这样一所大房子。

column2: v. 开始&发明&发起 [计算机] 起始
column3: The quarrel originated in rivalry between the two families.     这次争吵是两家不和引起的。 Who originated the concept of stereo sound?     立体声是谁发明的？

column2: n. 装饰(物) v. 装饰
column3: We bought some ornaments for the Christmas tree.     我们买了一些装饰品来点缀圣诞树。 I ornamented my room with flowers.     我用鲜花装饰房间。

column2: a. 装饰的 n. 装饰品
column3: I've just dropped one of your china ornamental.     我刚才把你的一个瓷器装饰品弄掉了。 Ornamental copper pans hung on the wall.     墙上挂着装饰性的铜盘。

column2: n. 孤儿 a. 无双亲的&孤儿的 v. 成孤儿
column3: She was orphaned at the age of ten.     她在十岁时成为孤儿。 My cousin is an orphan; her parents died when she was young.     我的表姐是孤儿&她的父母在她小时候就去世了。

Orthodox Christian churches often have elaborate steeples.     传统的基督教堂都有精致的尖塔。 Roman Catholics were the next largest group with46& 000& 000 members& There were5& 600& 000 Jews and700& 000 Eastern Orthodox Christians.     罗马天主教是第二个最大的团体&有四千六百万教徒。犹太教徒有五百六十万&东正教徒有七十万。

column2: v. 振动&彷徨&犹豫 v. 使振动&使动摇

column2: n. 振动&动摇&变动彷徨
column3: Her oscillations in mood are maddening.     她喜怒无常能把人气疯。

Shrinkage or contraction of the protoplasm away from the wall of a living plant or bacterial cell& caused by loss of water through osmosis.     胞质皱缩通过渗透作用由于缺水引起的活植细胞或细菌的细胞质的皱缩或收缩&并与细胞壁分离 Learned French by osmosis while residing in Paris for15 years.     居住在巴黎的十五年中已经潜移默化地学习了法语
Seeming or professed; ostensible.     假装的表面上的或自称的；貌似真实的 An ostensible or professed purpose; an excuse.     借口&托词表面的目的；理由

column2: n. 虚饰&虚有其表&卖弄
column3: Exhibiting no pretensions& boastfulness& or ostentation; modest.     不装腔作势的不装腔作势的&不夸耀的；不铺张招摇的；谦逊

column2: a. 别的&其他的 pron. 另一个人(或事)
column3: She is more clever than the other girls in her class.     她比班上其他任何女孩子都聪明。 The other students in my class are from Italy.     我班其余同学都是意大利人。

column2: ad. 否则&要不然&不同地&别的方式
column3: Some are wise& some are otherwise.     有些人聪明&有些人则不然。 She is not very clever& but otherwise she's a nice girl.     她并不聪明&但在其他方面&她倒是个好姑娘。
You ought to be more careful& you know.     你应该小心一点&知道吗？ He ought to/should be here in time he started early enough.     他该[应]按时到这里--他出发得够早的.
He tried to open the door by using every ounce of his strength.     他用尽全部力气想把门打开。 How many calories can an ounce of sugar supply?     一盎司糖可以供给多少卡热量？
That's not our business.     那事与我们不相干。 This could change our life.     这可能会改变我们的生活。
Your house is much bigger than ours.     你们的房子比我们的大多了。 Their opinion jarred with ours.     他们的意见与我们不一致。
We finished the job all by ourselves.     我们全靠自己完成了这项工作。 We built ourselves a new surgery.     我们给自己建了一间新的外科手术室。
The umpire ousted the arguing player from the game.     裁判员将那位不服判决的运动员罚下场。 Fox was ousted from office but he had nothing to say for himself.     福克斯被赶下台&但是他没有什么可特别为自己辨护的。

column2: a. 外面的&下台的& 出局的 ad. 在外&熄减&出现 prep. 出外&离去&向
column3: He took out a book from the case.     他从箱子里拿出一本书。 The fire has gone out.     火已熄灭。
There has been an outbreak of typhoid.     那儿正爆发伤寒。 The outbreak of riot caused many people to die.     暴乱的发生使很多人丧生。

column2: a. 被逐出的&被遗弃的&无家可归的 n. 被驱逐的人&流浪人&无赖
column3: He was treated as an outcast.     他遭到被人赶出似的对待。 The outcast boy was brought up by the government.     这个被遗弃的孩子是由政府抚养大的。
What was the outcome of your meeting?     你们会晤的结果如何? The necessary outcome of a war is a fall in production.     战争带来的必然结果就是生产力下降。

column2: n. 尖叫&倒彩&强烈抗议

column2: a. 旧式的&落伍的&过时的 v. 使时 vbl. 过时

She outdid all her classmates.     她超过她的所有同班同学。 He has outdone all his rivals in skill.     他在技巧方面胜过所有的对手。
Children like outdoor activities.     孩子们喜欢户外活动。 I'm very keen on outdoor sports.     我非常喜欢室外运动。

These creatures were believed to have come from outer space.     据信这种生物来自外太空。 The outer walls of the building were painted blue.     这座建筑的外墙被漆成了蓝色。

column2: a. 最外方的(最远的&最高头的)
n. 用具&配备&机构 v. 配备&供应

column2: n. 外出&开支&流出 a. 喜欢外出的 [计算机] 输出

How Harry came into the possession of this outlandish stuff makes an interesting story which he is fond of relating.     哈里如何得到这种稀奇古怪的东西&是一个他津津乐道的有趣的故事。

column2: n. 费用&经费&支出 v. 花费

column2: n. 出口&出路&通风口&批发商店

column2: n. 观点&见解&展望&前景

column2: a. 远离中心的&偏僻的

We were completely outnumbered by the enemy.     在数量上我们完全被敌人压倒。 Men outnumber women here in the ratio of three to one.     此地男子数量以三比一超过女子。

column2: n. 成绩优于 v. 超额完成&过度执行
n. 产量&输出&输出功率 vt. 输出(信息等)

column2: n. 暴行&侮辱&愤怒 v. 凌辱&虐待&触犯

column2: a. 暴虐的&极无礼的&可恶的  惊人的&肆无忌惮的&毫无节制的
column3: His treatment of his wife is outrageous.     他对待妻子十分蛮横。 The price is outrageous.     价钱高得吓人。

column2: a. 率直的&完全的&总共的 ad. 率直地&立刻地&一直向前
column3: I bought a house outright.     我以一次付款方式买了一栋房子。 She was the outright winner.     毫无疑问她是优胜者。
The start or initial stage; the outset.     开始&开端开始或初始阶段 The teacher laid emphasis on the precision of the translation from the outset.     老师从一开始就强调翻译准确性。

column2: ad. 在外面 n.&a. 外部 prep. 在...外 pron. 在...外边
column3: He has a rough outside& but a good heart.     他外表粗鲁&心地善良。 The house was painted green outside.     这房子外部漆成绿色。

column2: n. 外行(旁观者&没有关系的人)
column3: Although she's lived there for ten years& the villagers still treat her as an outsider.     她虽然在那儿住了十年& 村里人仍视她如外人. That horse is a complete outsider; I wouldn't waste your money on it.     那匹马绝无获胜可能& 我要是你可不把钱压在它身上.

Presently she recognized that she was already in the outskirts of the city.     不久她看出&她已经到达这座城市的郊区。 Fires swept through the outskirts& where the houses& being mostly of wood& were razed to the ground.     大火席卷郊区&那里的房屋多数都是木造的&被烧成了一片废墟。

column2: a. 直言无讳的&坦率的&坦白无隐的
